name: Rise Up.
description:
Playing Rise Up is simple. Balloon will rise up touch anywhere on the screen and drag left or right to move the balloon. Green is friendly so don’t worry about touching them. Avoid the black and red tiles or your balloon will pop and the game will be over!

Balloon control is very easy but it's very hard to reach high scores!

Challenge your friends for the highest score!

Game Features:
- Free to play
- One finger control
- Different obstacles and experience every time
- Endless gameplay
